## reduceDict() function

Incrementally arrive at a singular value from a `Dict<T>` using a reducer function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function reduceDict<T, U>(input: Dict<T>, reducer: (previousValue: U, currentValue: T, key: string, dict: Dict<T>) => U, initialValue: U): U;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | Dict&lt;T&gt; | Dictionary to reduce |
|  reducer | (previousValue: U, currentValue: T, key: string, dict: Dict&lt;T&gt;) =&gt; U | The reducer function |
|  initialValue | U | The initial value of the accumulator |

<b>Returns:</b>

U
